1712958106.4582117.sceneDescription: In this video segment, a person is opening a package of sliced bread and then takes out two slices of bread, placing them side by side on a wooden cutting board or surface. This action suggests that the person might be preparing to make a sandwich or some other meal involving bread.

1712958124.832211.sceneDescription: In this video segment, someone is preparing two slices of bread by spreading Nuttelex, a plant-based butter alternative, on them. The bread is on a wooden surface, and the hands are seen holding the Nuttelex container and spreading the product.

1712958139.1923606.sceneDescription: In this segment of the video, someone is spreading butter on two slices of bread. The person is using a knife to apply the butter evenly across each slice.

1712958157.4495559.sceneDescription: In this segment of the video, someone is spreading what appears to be a kind of spreadable butter or cream cheese onto two slices of bread. The spread is being applied evenly across the surface of the slices.

1712958171.019024.sceneDescription: In this segment of the video, a person is removing the lid from a jar, revealing a label that reads "Strawberry/Raspberry/Blueberry Jam" with a date indicating it was made in December 2019. They then proceed to spread the jam onto two slices of bread laid out on a wooden surface.

1712958188.1424341.sceneDescription: In this sequence of images, someone is preparing toast by first spreading a creamy, herb-flecked substance, likely butter or a herb-infused spread, and then topping it with a red, viscous condiment, which appears to be jam or jelly. The person is using a knife to apply both substances to the slices of bread.

1712958203.9257958.sceneDescription: In this segment of the video, a person is spreading a red, jelly-like substance on a slice of bread that already has a white spread on it. They use a knife to apply and evenly distribute the jelly over the bread.

1712958221.1853018.sceneDescription: In this segment of video, a person is spreading jam on a slice of bread with a knife. The bread is resting on a wooden surface and the individual is using their left hand to hold the bread steady while spreading the jam with their right hand.

1712958236.5446.sceneDescription: In the video, someone is preparing a sandwich by spreading what appears to be cream cheese and strawberry jam on two separate slices of bread and then putting them together. The hands are shown completing the action, resulting in a cream cheese and jam sandwich.

1712958249.0076938.sceneDescription: The segment depicts someone cutting a piece of toast into four triangular pieces on a wooden surface. After cutting the bread, they cover the pieces with a plate, likely to set aside or serve.

1712958287.067034.sceneDescription: In this segment of the video, a person is cutting a sandwich into progressively smaller triangular pieces and arranging them on a plate. Each subsequent image shows the sandwich being split into half of the previous size, likely demonstrating a concept or simply preparing bite-sized portions.

1712958297.8234935.sceneDescription: In this segment of a video, a person is assembling a sandwich, starting with an already cut sandwich triangle and adding a folded piece of what appears to be pretzel bread. They then adjust the pieces slightly to fit neatly on the plate.
